name: unacted
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not done or performed: He used his writing as an outlet for unacted desires. Among her papers were several long poems and unacted plays. unacted upon
If a wish is unacted upon, you do not do anything to try to make it happen: His violent inclinations remained unacted upon.
See more
More examplesFewer examplesYou should not allow your desires to go unacted.The story explores the unacted evil that many humans have in their hearts.The letter revealed her strong feelings, although these were unacted upon.
